title: Minecraft 1.6.2 Easy Installer 9.0 ~kaise123~ 26/08/2013
description:
********************* Kaise123 | www.kaise123.com ************************
Minecraft Installer 9.0 for Minecraft 1.6.2

Please read the included Readme document for information on controls, and where to find information on the latest releases.

The Readme document also includes a troubleshooting section which I recommend you read if you run into trouble.

My Minecraft client comes pre-packaged in an easy to use installer, and also with several useful mods should you choose to use them.
This makes the game easy to install, and also improves your experience of the game without changing the core components, so that the game is enhanced but still relatively similar to the original.

This installer has the option to install Minecraft without any modifications whatsoever and also a modded version (read the readme for info on mods) All versions have an in-built list of cracked Minecraft servers.

I take no credit for the loader, which was created by Smaramoule

This is an easy-to-use, user-friendly way of putting Minecraft on your computer.

You can contact me via e-mail <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="16687d777f657327242556717b777f7a3875797b">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

################### ABOUT ####################

This no longer fits onto TPB's description section. Please see the included readme or kaise123 com/mcclient (Put a dot in between kaise123 and com)

################## CHANGES ###################

For Minecraft 1.6.2

+Added TabbyChat
+Added additional features to menu (Screenshot and Skin manager)
